# AI-TaskTrack Project Index
# Generated: 2025-01-07T15:00:00Z
# Format: llms.txt v1.0

## Project Overview
AI-TaskTrack: Lightweight AI-native task management system
Active epics: 0
Open issues: 0
Completed tasks: 0

## Key Files
/templates/: File templates for epics, issues, and tasks
/.aitasktrack/config.yaml: Project configuration
/docs/: Complete documentation
/README.md: Project overview and getting started

## Current Focus
Project setup and initial documentation

## Quick Commands
Initialize project: `aitasktrack init`
Create epic: `aitasktrack create epic "Epic Title"`
Create issue: `aitasktrack create issue "Issue Title" --epic=EPIC-001`
Generate llms.txt: `aitasktrack generate llms-txt`

## Integration Status
GitHub: Not configured
Jira: Not configured
Linear: Not configured

## Token Budget
No active tracking (development phase)
